varga ādiḥ abhīṣṭa antaḥ prastāraḥ bhavati yava madhyaḥ

original: BSS_20.4a/ sūnontyo dvipadāgraṃ tripadādyānāmadhaḥ pṛthak saṃkhyā/
analyzed: sūnu antyaḥ dvipada agram tripada ādyānām adhas pṛthak saṃkhyā
tad śodhyaḥ vyekaḥ pṛthak antāt rūpam ūrdhva yutam
yāvat pādāvī ekā āgacchāt varṇeṣu atha eka vṛddheṣu
rūpa ādi uta ghāte varga ādyānām parā saṃkhyā
rūpa adhika pāda ardhe viṣameṣu ūrdhvaḥ sameṣu pāda ardhe
ardhādviguṇa avi eka aṃyulāni adhas tasya sarveṣām
madhye prohya adya anyatas kuryāt
sa eka krama tulya ādyaiḥ nyāsaḥ abhyadhikaḥ viśodhitaḥ ca adhas

original: BSS_20.8c/ saṃkhyaikyaṃ tādṛk yādṛk prathamas trirahito naṣṭe//
analyzed: saṃkhyā aikyam tādṛś yādṛś prathamaḥ tri rahitaḥ naṣṭe

original: BSS_20.9a/ mādhyaiḥ kṛtaiś ca dalitaiḥ samasaṃkhyāyāṃ kramotkramāt kṣeppam/
analyzed: mādhyaiḥ kṛtaiḥ ca dalitaiḥ sama saṃkhyāyām krama utkramāt kṣeppam

original: BSS_20.9c/ viṣamāyāṃ vyekāyāṃ dalam kramād uttkramāt saikam//
analyzed: viṣamāyām vyekāyām dalam kramāt uttkramāt sa ekam
sama saṃkhyāyām sopāna krama utkramābhyām tathā eva viṣamābhyām

original: BSS_20.10c/ kalpyā pacite dṛṣṭe prathamaḥ śeṣākṣarāṇyante//
analyzed: kalpyā pacite dṛṣṭe prathamaḥ śeṣa akṣarāṇi ante
sama dala sama viṣamāṇām saṃkhyā pāda ardha sarva kalpa vadhaḥ

original: BSS_20.11c/ svādyavadho'nyaiḥ pādaiḥ svaparasya prāgvadhaḥ saikaiḥ//
analyzed: sva ādya vadhaḥ nyaiḥ pādaiḥ sva parasya prāc vadhaḥ sa ekaiḥ
ādyāt anantara udhaḥ prāk
nyāsaḥ vargaḥ ūni onaḥ prastāra ūrdha sama viṣamāṇām
naṣṭa intyāt sva adhastha ūna kalpa ghāta ūrdha tulya viṣamāṇām

original: BSS_20.13c/ vyekaḥ pṛthak svavargoddhṛtaḥ phalaṃ tulyakalyānām//
analyzed: vyekaḥ pṛthak sva varga uddhṛtaḥ phalam tulya kalyānām

original: BSS_20.14a/ uddiṣṭe kalpahṛte'tītaiḥ prathamaḥ phale sarūpe 'nyaḥ/
analyzed: uddiṣṭe kalpa hṛtā iti itaiḥ prathamaḥ phale sarūpe
asakṛt varga aṃśa yute sa eke vā ardha sama viṣamāṇām
viṣameṣu ādya laghūnaḥ laghubhiḥ meruḥ sama ādīnām
eka dvitayoḥ paratas dvi saṃguṇaḥ ūnantarāt virūpaḥ ūdhaḥ
varga dharā ādya ūna dala sama viṣamāṇām dhvajaḥ laghubhiḥ

original: BSS_20.17a/ laghusaṃkhyā padadalitā parato'dho'dhaś ca śudhyati hṛtā yaiḥ/
analyzed: laghu saṃkhyā pada dalitā ca śudhyati hṛtā yaiḥ

original: BSS_20.17c/ dviguṇāntaiḥ śuddhair vargaparair mandaro laghubhiḥ//
analyzed: dviguṇa antaiḥ śuddhaiḥ varga paraiḥ mandaraḥ laghubhiḥ
kṛtvā adhodhas kalpyāni eka ādi eka uttarān adhas teṣām

original: BSS_20.18c/ svāt parato'nyaikyam adhaḥ prastārād uktavad ihādyaiḥ//
analyzed: svāt paratas nyā aikyam adhas prastārāt ukta vat iha ādyaiḥ
guru ṣaṣṭi ekāni ghaṭī dviguṇāni eka aṃgulāni saṃkhyā syāt
drāviṃśatiḥ āryāṇām chandaḥ citi uttaraḥ adhyāyaḥ
iti śrī brāhmasphuṭasiddhānte chandaḥ citi uttara adhyāyaḥ viṃśatitamaḥ
jyā prakaraṇam

original: BSS_21.17a/ rāśi-%aṣṭa-aṃśeṣu aṅkān pada-sandhibhyas krama-utkramāt kṛtvā/
analyzed: rāśi aṣṭa aṃśeṣu aṅkān pada sandhibhyaḥ krama autkramāt kṛtvā
badhnīyāt sūtrāṇi dvayoḥ dvayoḥ jyāḥ tad ardhāni
jyāardhāni jyāardhānām jyākhaṇḍāni antarāṇi

original: BSS_21.18c/ vyastāni antyāt atha vā iṣus utkrama-jyā dhanus tābhyām//
analyzed: vyastāni antyāt atha vā iṣus utkramajyā dhanuḥ tābhyām
eka dvi triguṇāyāḥ vyāsa ardha kṛteḥ pṛthak caturthebhyaḥ
mūlāni aṣṭa dvādaśa ṣoḍaśa khaṇḍāni atas anyāni
prohya a naṣṭam vyāsa ardha vargataḥ tad pade prathamam
tad dala khaṇḍāni tad ūna jina samāni dvitīyam utpattau
kṛta yamala eka diśi īśa iṣu sapta rasa guṇa nava ādīnām

original: BSS_21.22a/ evam jīvā-khaṇḍāni alpāni bahūni vā ādya-khaṇḍāni/
analyzed: evam jīvākhaṇḍāni alpāni bahūni vā ādyakhaṇḍāni
jyā ardhāni vṛtta paridheḥ ṣaṣṭha caturtha tri bhāgānām

original: BSS_21.23a/ utkrama-sama-khaṇḍa-guṇāt vyāsāt atha vā %caturtha-bhāgāt yat/
analyzed: utkrama sama khaṇḍa guṇāt vyāsāt atha vā caturtha bhāgāt yat

original: BSS_21.23c/ kṛtvā ukta-khaṇḍakāni jyā-%ardha-ānayanam na laghu asmāt//
